Title: Righteous Brothers
Plot: Gob hides George Sr. while the model home's plumbing is checked; George Michael helps Ann protest Maeby's new movie; Tobias takes a liking to Kitty after Michael asks him to keep an eye on her.
GuestStars: Henry Winkler, Jeff Garlin, Marc Cherry, Ron Heubel, John Michael Higgins, Rob Huebel
